recommended_degree: Teknologi Informasi, Teknologi Informatika Multimedia Digital, Sistem Dan Teknologi Informasi, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description: - Analyze logistics business requirements (warehousing, transportation, forwarding, supply chain) and design suitable IT solutions. Develop, implement, and maintain logistics systems such as: Warehouse Management System (WMS), Transportation Management System (TMS), Freight Forwarding System ERP/SAP integration. - Integrate internal systems with external platforms (customer portals, e-commerce platforms, customs systems, tracking APIs). - Monitor system performance to ensure smooth supply chain operations (real-time tracking, inventory accuracy, on-time delivery). - Troubleshoot and resolve issues in logistics applications and system integrations. - Prepare data-driven analytics and reports (inventory turnover, delivery lead time, operational cost efficiency). - Stay updated on the latest logistics technologies (IoT, AI, big data, automation) and recommend system improvements or innovations.
